SELECT T5.OG_CD/*소속*/ , T1.PRTNR_NO /*번호*/ , T5.PRTNR_KNM /*성명*/ , T1.CNTR_NO || T1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_DTL_NO /*계약상세번호*/ , T1.CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , T1.CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ , T1.CST_NO /*고객번호*/ , (SELECT CST_KNM FROM TB_CUBS_CST_BAS S1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND S1.CST_NO = T1.CST_NO AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') AS CST_KNM /*고객명*/ , T1.SELL_TP_CD /*업무구분*/ , T1.PD_CD /*상품코드*/ , T3.PD_NM /*상품명*/ , T1.SELL_AMT /*판매금액*/ , T1.RENTAL_PTRM /*렌탈기간*/ , T1.RENTAL_TN /*렌탈차월*/ , T1.MM_ISTM_AMT /*월납부액*/ , NVL(T1.NOM_SL_AMT , 0) AS SL_AMT -- , NVL(T1.NOM_SL_AMT , 0) - NVL(T1.NOM_DSC_AMT , 0) - NVL(T1.SL_CTR_AMT , 0) + NVL(SPMT_SL_AMT , 0) + NVL(NOM_INT_AMT , 0) - NVL(INT_NOM_DSC_AMT , 0) AS SL_AMT /*정상매출-할인매출-매출조정+매출변경+정상이자-할인이자 = 매출액*/ , T1.PVDA_AMT /*현할차금액*/ , T1.SL_DC AS USE_DT /*사용일수*/ , T2.SL_RCOG_PRD_CD /*매출인식주기*/ , T2.FST_SL_RCOG_BASE_CD AS SL_RCOG_PRD_DV_CD /*매출인식기준*/ /*매출인식상태*/ /*오류내역*/ , T1.OSTR_DTM /*출고일자*/ , T1.IST_DTM /*설치일자*/ , T1.SV_DT /*서비스일자*/ , T1.CAN_DT AS CNTR_CAN_DTM /*계약취소일자*/ , T1.SL_RCOG_DT /*매출인식일자*/ , T1.FNL_MDFC_DTM /*변경일자*/ , F_CMZ_USR_NM(T1.FNL_MDFC_USR_ID) AS FNL_MDFC_USR_ID /* 변경자 */ FROM TB_RVDW_WELLS_SL_RCOG_BAS T1 /*WELLS매출인식기본*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_RVDW_SL_RCOG_BASE_BAS T2 /*매출인식기준기본*/ ON ( T2.KW_GRP_CO_CD = T1.KW_GRP_CO_CD AND T2.SL_RCOG_CLSF_CD = T1.SL_RCOG_CLSF_CD ) -- AND T2.APY_STRTDT = T1.SL_RCOG_DT ) JOIN ( SELECT S1.CNTR_NO , S1.CNTR_SN , S1.BASE_PD_CD , S1.SELL_AMT , S2.CNTR_CAN_DTM , PD_HCLSF_ID , PD_MCLSF_ID , PD_LCLSF_ID , PD_DCLSF_ID , CNTR_CNFM_DTM , CNTR_PD_STRTDT FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL S1 JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS S2 ON S2.CNTR_NO = S1.CNTR_NO AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
AND S1.SELL_TP_CD = #{cellTpCd} /* 조건: 업무구분 */
AND S2.SELL_INFLW_CHNL_DTL_CD = #{sellChnl} /*판매채널*/
) T3 ON ( T3.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T3.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN) JOIN WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T3 /*상품기본*/ ON ( T3.PD_CD = T1.PD_CD AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) LEFT OUTER JOIN LATERAL ( SELECT S2.OG_CD , S2.PRTNR_NO , S2.PRTNR_KNM , S2.OG_TP_CD , DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID , DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID , DGR3_LEVL_OG_ID FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ S1 JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ S2 ON S1.BASE_YM = S2.BASE_YM AND S1.OG_TP_CD = S2.OG_TP_CD AND S1.OG_ID = S2.OG_ID AND S2.BASE_YM = NVL(substr(T3.CNTR_CNFM_DTM,1,6), SUBSTR(T3.CNTR_PD_STRTDT, 1, 6)) WHERE 1 = 1 AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
AND S1.BASE_YM = NVL(substr(T3.CNTR_CNFM_DTM,1,6), SUBSTR(T3.CNTR_PD_STRTDT, 1, 6))
) T5
ON ( T5.OG_TP_CD = T1.OG_TP_CD AND T5.PRTNR_NO = T1.PRTNR_NO ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND SUBSTR(T1.SL_RCOG_CLSF_CD , 0 ,1) = 'W'
AND T1.SL_RCOG_DT >= #{startDate}/*매출인식일*/
AND T1.SL_RCOG_DT <= #{endDate}
AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo}/*계약번호*/
AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} /*계약일련번호*/
